Data Fields
vpsissRszInputConfig Struct Reference

Control structure used the define the operation mode and select region of frame to be processed. More...

#include <vps_cfgrsz.h>

Data Fields

vpsissRszOpMode_t opMode
 
Fvid2_CropConfig procWin
 
uint32_t overrideInCfg
 
Fvid2_DataFormat inDataFormat
 

Detailed Description

Control structure used the define the operation mode and select region of frame to be processed.

Field Documentation

Fvid2_DataFormat vpsissRszInputConfig::inDataFormat

Override input data format to this one

vpsissRszOpMode_t vpsissRszInputConfig::opMode

Resizer Operation Mode, can be bypass, pass through or resizing resizing mode is supported only for the YUV input format. For the Raw input, it should be be either bypassed or set to pass through mode, For YUV input, it can either enabled or bypassed or set to pass through mode

uint32_t vpsissRszInputConfig::overrideInCfg

Input configuration is set by the driver based in the SET_PARAMS ioctl, this flag is used to override input configuration and set the input configuration provided in this structure Currently it is only used to change input data format

Fvid2_CropConfig vpsissRszInputConfig::procWin

Window to be processed, RSZ module crops input image to this size and uses this size for all its processing
